lead_paragraph: MARKS--Donald, passed peacefully February 14, 2016. Donald was born in NYC on June 4, 1924. He was a WWII veteran and a proud recipient of the French Legion of Honor Medal. He was married for 63 years to his true love, Suzanne May, who predeceased him in 2013. Donald touched the lives of many during his years as an educator and as a camp head counselor. But his real passion was running, for which he credited his long life. He completed the NY Marathon at age 68 and continued to race until the age of 85. Donald is survived by his daughter Nina Rosen (Burt) and his granddaughters Ryan and Alexandra. Donations may be made to the WWII Memorial. 1/3
